sentences.en: A rise in the value of old securities is an indispensable preliminary to the flotation of new issues.
sentences.cn: 一只旧的有价证券的升值是浮现新问题的必不可少的第一步。

sentences.en: Effects of sodium sulfide on collectorless flotation of galena have been investigated.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了硫化钠对方铅矿无捕收剂浮选的影响.

sentences.en: Expounds liquid level control system of flotation machine and its industrial test.
sentences.cn: 介绍浮选机矿浆液位控制系统及其工业试验过程.

sentences.en: Flotation is a process for separating low density solids or liquid particles from a liquid phase.
sentences.cn: 浮选是从液体中分离出低密度固体物或液态颗粒.

sentences.en: Flotation is used for Florida and Kola rock.
sentences.cn: 浮选操作法用于佛罗里达磷矿和科拉磷矿.

sentences.en: Huang original nitrate, 11 th flotation oil processing and sales.
sentences.cn: 黄原酸盐 、 11号浮选油加工销售.

sentences.en: Kerosene and butyl xanthate were used as collectors in bulk flotation.
sentences.cn: 混合浮选采用煤油加丁基黄药作为捕收剂.

sentences.en: Multi - District flotation series, automatic feed pulp, using ink - floating bubble Xiedai to separate.
sentences.cn: 多级 浮选区串联, 自动送浆, 利用气泡挟带油墨离子上浮,使其分离出来.

sentences.en: Process mineralogy investigations were emphasized in designing new technologies of sulphide flotation.
sentences.cn: 工艺矿物学研究是设计确定硫化矿浮选新工艺的重要依据.

sentences.en: The pilot test shows that the flotation process is properly used.
sentences.cn: 中间试结果表明所选用的浮选工艺是合理的.

sentences.en: The result shows, the mixed flotation sulphidecopper is the best.
sentences.cn: 试验结果发现, 混合浮选流程选别指标最好.

sentences.en: The separated metals then feed into a series of flotation cells.
sentences.cn: 分离出的金属物料再传输到一系列的浮选槽.

sentences.en: The slides at main door can be used as flotation aid.
sentences.cn: 主出口的滑梯可用作辅助漂浮装置.

sentences.en: Therefore, flotation recovery should be taken into account for the slime.
sentences.cn: 因而考虑对细泥部分采用浮选回收.

sentences.en: Ultravioletspectrumspectrum and flotation solution chemistry were studied of scheelite and benzoylhydroxamic acid.
sentences.cn: 研究了天青石精矿复分解法制备碳酸锶的工艺及溶液化学作用机理.

sentences.en: When combined with XHF , it may consist a horizontal flotation system.
sentences.cn: 与XHF浮选机联合使用可形成水平布置的浮选系统.

phrases.tran_cn: 溶气浮选法；溶解气浮选

trans.tran_cn: 浮选，漂浮，漂浮状态，发行股票，发行公债
trans.tran_en: a container filled with air or gas, fixed to something to make it float
